sentences.sContent: The reform program was greeted with hostility by conservatives.
sentences.sCn: 改革方案遭到保守派人士的强烈反对。

remMethod.val: “好死踢了踢” → 这俩人非得争个你死我活， 想把对方踢死 → 敌对

words.tran: 敌对的，敌方的；怀敌意的

trans.tranCn: 敌意， 敌视， 敌对； 反对， 抵抗， 战争 ， 战斗
trans.tranOther: when someone is unfriendly and full of anger towards another person
